body.p: Powell County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Mary Bowen. Father of Margaret Bowen, Amanda Bowen, Newton Bowen, Sarah B. Bowen, William Bowen, Morton Bowen, John Bowen, Armstead Bowen, and Mary E. Bowen. Farmer in Montgomery County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Powell County in 1860.
